name: TypeScript
description: For the past 8 years, I've been developing complex web applications using TypeScript, especially with Angular and React. TypeScript has helped me enforce static types, improve code maintainability, and reduce runtime errors in large-scale projects.

name: Spring
description: I have been building microservices using Spring Boot, focusing on creating scalable and resilient architectures using Spring Cloud features.

name: React & React Native
description: I have built dynamic web and mobile applications with React and React Native, serving over 1.5 million customers. My expertise includes component-based architecture, state management (Redux), and optimizing performance for both web and mobile platforms.

name: Angular
description: In my 4 years of experience with Angular, I’ve developed reusable UI components and converted them into npm packages for enterprise-level applications. My focus has been on improving developer efficiency through modular and maintainable code.

name: Flutter & Dart
description: I developed a mobile application using Flutter & Dart, which included features like order management and user profiles. Flutter’s cross-platform capabilities allowed me to deliver the app efficiently on both Android and iOS.

name: Django & Python
description: I have used Django to build full-stack web applications including music and sport streaming web applications. Django’s powerful ORM and admin interface accelerated development and simplified database management.

name: Redux
description: I’ve used Redux extensively for managing application state in React and React Native projects, enabling predictable and maintainable state management in complex applications.

name: Leadship
description: Over the past four years as a Senior Software Engineer, I've led teams of 5-10 developers to successfully complete projects while also mentoring junior developers.

name: Java
description: I have used Java to build large-scale backend systems, focusing on building microservices with Spring Boot. Java’s performance and reliability make it my preferred language for developing scalable, enterprise-grade applications.

name: Docker
description: I have been using Docker for containerizing microservices, improving development workflows, and streamlining the deployment process. Docker has helped maintain consistency across environments and reduced configuration issues.

name: Ant Design
description: I have used Ant Design since 2021 to create clean, responsive UI components for enterprise applications. By leveraging its rich component library, I improved development speed and ensured design consistency across multiple projects.

name: Cassandra
description: I have utilized Cassandra for managing distributed, large-scale data systems. Cassandra's decentralized structure allowed me to build fault-tolerant, highly available databases for mission-critical applications.

name: Kafka
description: I began using Apache Kafka in 2020 for building event-driven microservices, enabling scalable and real-time data streaming between different components of the system.

name: APIGEE
description: In 2019, I started utilizing APIGEE for API management, focusing on securing, monitoring, and analyzing API traffic for large-scale microservices architectures.

name: Redis
description: I have integrated Redis into various microservices for caching and session management, resulting in improved application performance and reduced load times for data retrieval.

name: Jenkins
description: I have used Jenkins for automating CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless code integration, testing, and deployment. Jenkins helped me streamline release cycles and maintain a consistent production environment for a banking system.

name: AWS
description: I have deployed, managed, and scaled applications using AWS services such as EC2, S3, and RDS. My focus has been on creating highly available and fault-tolerant architectures for web applications.

name: ELK Stack
description: I have used the ELK Stack to set up centralized logging and real-time monitoring for microservices architectures. By analyzing logs and metrics, I was able to improve system observability and performance troubleshooting.

name: Oracle
description: I have worked with Oracle to handle relational data for banking applications, focusing on query optimization, transaction management.

name: SonarQube
description: I have incorporated SonarQube into the development pipeline to automate static code analysis, ensuring code quality, security, and adherence to best practices, reducing technical debt in large-scale projects.

name: MySQL
description: I’ve worked with MySQL for 5 years, designing and managing databases for high-traffic web applications. I focused on indexing, query optimization, and database scaling to ensure efficient data management.

name: JUnit
description: I’ve been using JUnit to create comprehensive unit tests for Java applications, ensuring robust code quality and minimizing production issues. I also integrated JUnit tests into CI/CD pipelines for automated testing.

name: Jest
description: I have used Jest for testing JavaScript applications, particularly with React. Jest’s fast and reliable testing helped ensure that complex web applications were well-tested before release.

name: Cross Functional Teams
description: In my role as a Senior Software Engineer, I have collaborated with cross-functional teams, working closely with product, design, and QA teams to deliver projects efficiently and meet business goals.
